#summary Patterns and best practices for using Objectify

= Registering Your Entities =

The first question you will have is "when and how should I register my entity classes?"

The best way is to create your own service class extending ObjectifyService:

{{{
public class DAO extends ObjectifyService
{
	static {
		fact().register(YourEntity.class);
		fact().register(YourOtherEntity.class);

		fact().setDatastoreTimeoutRetryCount(3);
	}
}
}}}
